itunes:title: @LittleTFitness | get upside down & out of your comfort zone
title: @LittleTFitness | get upside down & out of your comfort zone
itunes:author: Brittany Lupton
description:
All aboard the mobility train! There's no one way to move & this week Britt's determined to get you upside down & out of your comfort zone with the strength, calisthenics & mobility queen, @LittleTFitness aka Taylor! Get ready to chat tricks, mental blocks, how & where to start, plus a fun mobility challenge!


Train with Britt Start Your 7 Day Free Trial Today!

Shop Gymshark Shop my favorite Gym Fits!


Follow the podcast

@funandgains.podcast


Follow Britt

insta // @_brittanylupton

youtube // Brittany Lupton

tiktok // brittanylupton


Follow Taylor

insta // @littletfitness

tiktok // @littletfitness
